frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-change-desktop-background-when-workspace-empty
frozen.shortDescription: Changes the desktop background when the workspace is or becomes empty, such as switching to an empty workspace, when all windows on a workspace are closed, or after login.
frozen.longDescription:
Changes the desktop background when the workspace is or becomes empty, such as switching to an empty workspace, when all windows on a workspace are closed, or after login.
No folder needs to be set explicitly, as it will use the folder that the current background is in.
